description: Try our easy to follow Barley Risotto With Roast Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Barley Risotto With Roast Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g baby beetroot, peeled, cut into wedges
250g sweet potato, peeled, cut into 2cm dice

recipeInstructions.text: Combine half the onion and garlic with sweet potato, beetroot and carrot in a large roasting pan. Add half of the oil, toss to coat and season. Roast for 30 minutes until tender.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add remaining onion, garlic and thyme and cook for 5 minutes until softened. Add barley and stir for 1 minute to coat the grains. Add 1 cup of the stock and simmer until absorbed. Add remaining stock and simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes stirring occasionally until barley is tender.
Add spinach, cover and cook for 2 minutes until wilted. Stir in vegetables and season. Serve topped with parmesan.
